profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.5.3 Annotation dictionaries - Normal appearance
profile.description: If an annotation dictionary contains the AP key, the appearance dictionary that it defines as its value shall contain only the N key, whose value shall be a stream defining the appearance of the annotation.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium
